name: Dutchoven
0:
”Alexa ask Dutch oven”
”How many coals do I need to cook a 14 inch oven 400 degrees”
”How do I cook an 8 inch Oven at 350 degrees”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dutch oven
des: Using your Dutch oven size and a desired cooking temperature find out the recommended number of coal and placement of those coals in order to maintain your desired cooking temperature. Standard Dutch oven sizes 8 inches - 14 inches and cooking ranges 325-450 degrees (25 degree increments) are supported.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
